name: Project Alpha
description: This is the first project, focusing on data visualization and backend integration. It uses D3.js for charts and a Node.js server to handle API requests. The theme is inspired by retro-futurism.

name: Space Navigator
description: An interactive 3D map of the solar system built with Three.js. Users can click on planets to get more information. This project was a deep dive into WebGL and 3D rendering performance.

name: Pixel Art Editor
description: A simple browser-based pixel art editor. This was a fun weekend project to explore canvas manipulation and implementing features like a color palette and save/load functionality.
